snippet: As the only representative of his country in the Winter Olympics, 17-year-old Michael Christian Martinez is satisfied with his 19th-place finish in the men’s singles competition.
lead_paragraph: As the only representative of his country in the Winter Olympics, 17-year-old Michael Christian Martinez is satisfied with his 19th-place finish in the men’s singles competition.

headline.main: Filipino Figure Skater Is Happy Just Being in Sochi
headline.print_headline: Filipino Figure Skater Is Happy Just Being in Sochi
